oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Interview with Umm Māzin al-Yamānī
مقابلة مع أم مازن اليماني
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Short stories, Arabic--Palestine
Children's stories, Arabic--Palestine
Fables, Arabic--Palestine
Lullabies, Arabic--Palestine
oai_dc:dc.dc:otherSubject: Birds; Caves; Chickens; Guards; Hiding; Homeland; Hyenas; Jerusalem (Palestine); Judges; Machination; Money; Muḥammad, Prophet, 571-633; Occupied territories; Prayers; Return; Shepherds; Suḥmātā (Palestine); Thieves; Wisdom; Birds; Children; Chores; Customs and traditions; Dispersion; Friendship; Gifts; Loved ones; Lullabies; Medical doctors; Peasants; Rural life; Travel; Akka (Palestine); Beheading; Betrayal; Blindness; Boys; Bracelets; Brides; Brothers; Children; Emotions; Customs and traditions; Dietary practices; God's will; Hardship; Hatred; Horses; Jaffa (Palestine); Jinn; Kings; Machination; Marriage; Money; Nazareth (Palestine); Ogres; Poems; Riddles; Soap; Sons; Water wells; Wives; Work
oai_dc:dc.dc:biography: The interview was recorded on April 30, 1997 with Umm Māzin al-Yamānī, female, born in 1933 in Suḥmātā, Palestine and resides in al-Baddāwī Palestinian Refugee Camp, Lebanon.
oai_dc:dc.dc:biographyAR: سجلت المقابلة مع أم مازن اليماني في 30 نيسان أبريل عام 1997، أنثى، ولدت عام 1933 في سحماتا، فلسطين وتقيم في مخيم البداوي للاجئين الفلسطينيين، لبنان.
oai_dc:dc.dc:toc: Abū al-Ḥusayn story or Sleeping stories. (@ 0:00)
oai_dc:dc.dc:tocAR: حكاية أبو الحسين أو حكايات ما قبل النوم. (@ 0:00)
